ygData.subject: quest help / armor question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all! I have a question about the Paladin quest in Nfreeport. It s the one about the tokens of courage and generosity, anyone know where i can find those
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all!

I have a question about the Paladin quest in Nfreeport. It's the one about
the tokens of courage and generosity, anyone know where i can find those
tokens he did not give any hints whatsoever:(
Also the dwarven ringmail tunic, i understand that's it's for small races
only? but I seen a couple of high-elves wearing them, so is it possible for
human to wear it as well?
Any help will be greatly appreciated, thanx!


Bobaliya
